#### Epidemiology | Data Analysis | Project Management | Columbia and Johns Hopkins Graduate

I recently completed a Master of Science (MS) in Epidemiology at Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health. I previously graduated Phi Beta Kappa from Johns Hopkins University with a BA in Biology (minor in Pyschology). 

I have substantial experience in epidemiological research (particularly cancer epi), data analysis, technical writing, systematic reviews, and project management.
